# Words are ignored when included in valid struct tags.
! gospel -show=false
! stdout '"goodtag"'
! stdout '"maskedmistake"'
! stdout '"emb"'
! stdout '"edded"'
stdout 'main.go:3:1: "badtag" is misspelled in comment'
stdout 'main.go:3:1: "unmaskedmistake" is misspelled in comment'
stdout 'main.go:3:1: "unexported" is misspelled in comment'
stdout 'main.go:3:1: "failedmistake" is misspelled in comment'
! stderr .

-- go.mod --
module dummy
-- main.go --
package main

// goodtag
// maskedmistake
// badtag
// unmaskedmistake
// unexported
// failedmistake
// emb
// edded
type T struct {
	F1 int `goodtag:"maskedmistake"`
	F2 int `badtag: "unmaskedmistake"`
	f3 int `unexported:"failedmistake"`
	E  `emb:"edded"`
}

type E int

func main() {
}
